title: No comic today
author: JGray
text:
I want to apologize. There won't be a new page until Monday. A close friend of Keith's has died and he asked for a little time off to attend to that.

Thank you for understanding.

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: Absolutely.  Thanks for the warning, too - so nobody starts bitching about "lazy artista".

replies.author: David*Guest*
replies.text: Understood. Keep well, Keith, and my condolences.

replies.author: Lukkai*Guest*
replies.text: As someone who's lost two friends and two family members over the last three months, I can relate. Condolences to Keith and take care.

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: Sorry to read that. You have my condolences Keith.
